Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory318.png'}
{3: 'The dawning sun rises above the horizon, outlining the silhouette of Conservation Area 112.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Echo', 3: "It's right ahead... Ugh.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is everything okay?', 3: '7'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "My M.I.N.D. is hurting a little bit. I guess it's the aftereffects of yesterday's interference.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "It's nothing major. Let's keep moving.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Babylonia has registered Conservation Area 112 as a "Hetero-Creature-ambushed conservation area", an outpost destroyed because of Hetero-Creatures.'}
{3: 'Only a few residents who went out to gather supplies managed to escape. Everyone else inside the conservation area, including the Task Force that went to help, did not survive the incident.'}
{3: 'It was a while before some remains were found in the nearby field, but even those could not be confirmed to belong to residents from Conservation Area 112.'}
{3: 'However, if Asimov saw records of this conservation area in the internal experiment reports from Fort Winter...'}
{2: 'Is the destruction of Conservation Area 112 related to Utopia as well?', 3: '16'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Echo', 3: "I can't remember exactly, but Utopia did take in a lot of people every once in a while. Some of them were humans, and some were heavily injured Constructs.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'I occasionally talked to them in between classes. All I remember is they seemed to come from many different places—conservation areas, Forsaken, even... Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Cecily came from Babylonia, as a matter of fact. For some reason, she always shook her head with a smile when I asked about Babylonia as if... she was upset.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Echo presses her forehead again.'}
{2: 'Your M.I.N.D. is still in pain?', 3: '24'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: '...Yeah, but it should be nothing severe.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's take a break.", 3: '27'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: '...Sounds good.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Surprisingly, Echo does not protest your request to rest for once. You choose a somewhat cleaner spot by the road to sit down.'}
{3: 'You take this time to send Lee all the information you have gathered from Echo\'s "story" and ask him to encrypt it before sending it to Asimov.'}
{3: 'From what you have gathered, Kurono likely has a secret force called Aurora Squadron on the surface based in a flying fortress called Utopia.'}
{3: 'Dr. Pickman was apparently in charge of Utopia, and Utopia took in some Constructs from Babylonia as one of them was named Cecily...'}
{3: 'Would Kurono really create a place that was meant to take in injured Constructs and folks from conservation areas out of the kindness of their heart?'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You quickly finish editing your message before calling for Echo to continue the journey, but you hear the humming of the armor instead.'}
{2: '—A M.I.N.D. interference?', 3: '45'}
{3: 'You hear a low buzz from ahead of you... and notice a drone equipped with a M.I.N.D. disruptor!'}
{3: "Lee is nearby. You immediately message him for reinforcement while inspecting Echo's status."}
{2: 'Echo', 3: '...Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Echo seems still somewhat conscious...'}
{2: '(Contact Asimov through an encrypted channel)', 3: '51'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Speak quickly. It's risky to contact me this way.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'How to stabilize a M.I.N.D. being interfered with this way?', 3: '58'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'You want me to diagnose this through a call? What kind of magical doctor do you think I am?', 4: '11'}
{2: '(Briefly describe the M.I.N.D. disruptor you saw)', 3: '60'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '...A device that attacks the M.I.N.D. directly?', 4: '11'}
{3: 'Asimov finally sounds intrigued.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'If she is still conscious, connect to her and enter her deep M.I.N.D. Try to stabilize her from within.', 4: '11'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "But it's risky. After all, you have to perform a Deep M.I.N.D. connection with her using your Mind Beacon. No one knows what exists in the M.I.N.D. of a Construct Babylonia hasn't registered.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'How did you get involved with her?', 4: '11'}
{2: 'This is a temporary alliance.', 3: '66'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'A temporary alliance...', 4: '11'}
{2: 'She has something we want.', 3: '68'}
{3: 'If you can bring Echo back to Babylonia before the Purifying Force does, you will be a step ahead of Kurono.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "It's dangerous, but it's plausible. Be careful.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Bring me a sample of that M.I.N.D. disruptor device.', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "...I have to hang up. Call me on this channel again if there's an emergency.", 4: '11'}
{3: 'Asimov ends the call.'}
{2: 'Can you hear me, Echo?', 3: '77'}
{3: 'Echo struggles to respond to you.'}
{2: 'I have to establish a M.I.N.D. connection with you to stabilize your M.I.N.D.', 3: '81'}
{3: 'Echo raises a finger, indicating that she is ready.'}
{3: 'Commencing M.I.N.D. connection!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie2New.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie3New.prefab', 2: '3'}
